comments:
Description:
NPE pop up when add a data in grid that binding a result set[0005]

Step:
1. New a datasource and dataset.
2. New a table named table and binding the dataset.
3. New a grid.
4. Switch xml view and add 
<property name="dataBindingRef">table</property>
5. Switch to layout again, and add a data in grid cell.

Actual result:
The NPE pop up.
